excerpt: A creamy and flavorful vegan soup perfect for cold weather.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, and black pepper and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Add butternut squash and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil and reduce heat to simmer. Cook for 20 minutes or until squash is tender.
Stir in coconut milk and cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Using an immersion blender or a regular blender, puree soup until smooth.
